no_global_vars.message: Global variables can cause hidden side effects and make code harder to test and maintain.

sanitize_inputs.description: Ensure user inputs are properly sanitized
sanitize_inputs.message: User inputs should be sanitized to prevent injection attacks and data corruption.

disallow_raw_sql.description: Prevent raw SQL queries without parameterization
disallow_raw_sql.message: Raw SQL queries are vulnerable to SQL injection attacks. Use parameterized queries instead.

no_hardcoded_secrets.message: Hardcoded secrets in source code are a security risk. Use environment variables or secure configuration.

require_error_handling.description: Ensure proper error handling is implemented
require_error_handling.message: Functions should include proper error handling to prevent unexpected crashes.

no_direct_file_operations.description: Prevent direct file operations without proper validation
no_direct_file_operations.message: File operations should include proper path validation and error handling.

require_type_hints.description: Require type hints for function parameters and return values
require_type_hints.message: Type hints improve code readability and enable better static analysis.

no_eval.message: eval() can execute arbitrary code and is a security risk.
